channel.title: School Uniform or not?
channel.description:
Should we have school uniform or not.
I currently have to wear it and it looks quite good because we have all back and we can wear anything over it. We also get some days near the end of term where we can wear whatever we want and those dats feel good.
I wouldn't personally want to be in non-uniform all the time because people would ripp you if you wore the same clothes day after day. Also it would be sick on your parent/s because they would have to buy you new clothes for you too fit in and they might not be able to afford it.
Please debate. I am also doing this because for my English speaking and listening test I have to do a debate and I chose this topic because there is quite a lot of arguements for and against.
Thanks ~KC

item.title: School Uniform or not?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Cruddell1109:

I think school uniforms suck 2, our teachers give us detention if we dont wear our stupid green uniform and if we even wear the wrong shoes we get detention! how gay is that!?

Teachers do that at our school to. I mean we aren’t even allowed to wear gloves walking around school even when its freezing.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

shadow hearts:

uniforms suck, at my school we have really cool shorts… but the shirts are itchy and shorts or not it’s nice to wear what you want.

Really… cool… shorts…?

Yeah uniform sucks, our teachers say “Dressing smartly makes you work better…” or something like that. They think that if people wear uniforms suddenly they will be smart and rule the world with their knowledge! Stupid teachers…

item.title: School Uniform or not?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“regecks`, post:19, topic:39478”]I didn’t actually read any of this thread, just the title, but here is my opinion.

“School uniforms are good because all my clothes suck and all the people will think worse of me than they would if I was wearing a uniform.”[/quote]
Well when you hang out with people after school(or do you?) would they not think less of you then? And if they do, then tell them to go suck a cock or something.

People, even friends, rip on each other all the time about anything they can think about.

Read full topic

item.title: School Uniform or not?
item.dc:creator: @KC1 KC
item.description:
@KC1 wrote:

jme_009:

By nerdy kids, I mean those D&D nerds who carry laptops around 24/7 and don’t shower for weeks at a time, with hair going to their ankles, and bullet proof glasses.

We have a lad like that in our school and he hasn’t had a shower for about 4 weeks, I’ll have to check if he has after Christmas.

[quote=“regecks`, post:19, topic:39478”]I didn’t actually read any of this thread, just the title, but here is my opinion.

“School uniforms are good because all my clothes suck and all the people will think worse of me than they would if I was wearing a uniform.”[/quote]
Good thinking

Skating On Java:

No i hate wearing uniform. It’s all … itchy and… errghh!

You are very true that it is very itchy and it is also very uncomfortable.

Thanks for the comments

~KC

item.title: School Uniform or not?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Mopman:

If you’re the type of person to take shit at high school, you’re gonna take it whether you’re in a uniform or not.

So true.

They couldn’t make us wear uniforms here if they tried. My school is completly loaded with bad-ass wannabe’s, they wouldn’t take that shit. I remember back in elementry school, someone ripped on me for wearing some cheap walmart shoes. Since the person ripping on me was one of the more umpopular kids in the school, and I wasn’t friends with him, I gave him a simple warning push telling him to back off, and he came so damn close to falling the the recycling bin lol. Although normally now I only wear good brand names, but I noticed now it seems almost everyone has stopped giving a shit about what people are wearing. The majority of people it seems that they stop being an ass at age 16, but I can’t say much because I know I’ve always been as ass to the nerdy kids(Seriously, you’ve got to see this kid in our school, he’s identical to napolean dynamite). By nerdy kids, I mean those D&D nerds who carry laptops around 24/7 and don’t shower for weeks at a time, with hair going to their ankles, and bullet proof glasses.

Read full topic
